parameters.name: resourceType
parameters.description: Type of resources to retrieve. Valid values are: routes, waypoints, notes, regions, charts

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return

parameters.name: distance
parameters.description: Limit results to resources that fall within a square area, centered around the vessel's position, the edges of which are the sepecified distance in meters from the vessel.

parameters.name: bbox
parameters.description: Limit results to resources that fall within the bounded area defined as lower left (south west) and upper right (north east) coordinates [swlon,swlat,nelon,nelat]
